title: Herbalife Ghana; country director win awards in Lagos
text:
20:06 CET Herbalife Ghana; country director win awards in Lagos By MyJoyOnline 
Herbalife of Ghana Ltd. and its country director, Mr. Frederick Amissah, bagged two awards at Saturday’s West African Regional Magazine Achievers Awards organised at the Eko Hotel & Suites, Lagos Nigeria. 
The awards was under the theme “Agriculture in poverty alleviation & economic development’’. 
Whilst Herbalife Ghana won the ‘’Innovative Foreign Products of the year award’’, its country director won the coveted ‘’Marketing Person of the Year Award’’. 
Speaking after the event, Mr. Frederick Amissah said Herbalife as a company is positioned to help address both the nutritional and economic situation of Ghanaians and beyond. The company, a subsidiary of global nutrition giant, Herbalife International of America, Inc. with operations in over 90 countries. 
Operations in Ghana, the only country in West Africa, began in December 2011 as a direct selling/network marketing company with the responsibility for product sales & distribution, sales support and marketing, portfolio management & innovation, training and motivation in synergy with our over 8000 plus network of independent direct members and customers. 
The company has a well-established mission which aims to change people’s lives by providing the best nutrition and weight-management products in the world and the best business opportunity in directselling. The company has four categories of products: Weight Management; Targeted Nutrition; Energy; and Outer Nutrition. 
Mr. Frederick Amissah said the company will continuously strive to work hard to support the economic and nutritional growth of Ghanaians. 
Touching on his recognition, Mr. Amissah said his interest in developing others stems from self-practice first and leading by example, motivation, empathy, coaching and mentoring, firmness, 360 degree feedback, networking, peer review and action learning. 
He dedicated his award to his hardworking workers and also to the youth whom he admonished to live a life of higher aspiration and excellence. 
Story by David Andoh | Ghana | myjoyonline.com [email protected]
